Question
========
A common tradeoff with Python is:

Answerlist
----------
* Pure Python can be slower
* It cannot read files
* It has no libraries
* It only runs on Windows

Solution
========
Performance can be slower without optimized libraries.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
